meanings.sent1: The trifoliolate plant had leaves with three parts.
meanings.sent2: The trifoliolate clover had three leaflets on each stem.
meanings.sent3: The trifoliolate tree looked like it was waving with its three-part leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her trifoliolate necklace had three delicate leaf-shaped pendants.
meanings.sent5: The trifoliolate pattern on the fabric made it unique and eye-catching.

meanings.definition: A plant with leaves divided into three leaflets.
meanings.sent1: The trifoliolate in the garden stood out with its triple leaf structure.
meanings.sent2: She admired the beauty of the trifoliolate as it swayed in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played hide-and-seek among the trifoliolate leaves.
meanings.sent4: The garden resembled a sea of trifoliolate, each plant a miniature forest.
meanings.sent5: The trifoliolate's greenery added a refreshing touch to the landscape.
